parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The domain name of the website.

> A forwarding rule must be configured for the domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](~~91724~~) operation to query all domain names.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. For example, to query the returned results on the first page, set the value to **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs in Resource Management. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that the instance belongs to the default resource group.
